text:
Hey everyone.  I'm running into a bit of an issue here.  I'm writing a template as an html file and I'm trying to output a few modules without any wrapping markup.  Unfortunately, setting `no_wrapper=True` isn't having any effect at all.  
This module:
`{% text "simple_text_field" label="Enter text here", no_wrapper=True, value="This is the default value for this text field" %}`

is outputting: 

`<div id="hs_cos_wrapper_simple_text_field" class="hs_cos_wrapper hs_cos_wrapper_widget hs_cos_wrapper_type_text" style="" data-hs-cos-general-type="widget" data-hs-cos-type="text">This is the default value for this text field</div>`

Any ideas?
